snippet: Golden State’s schedule does not have much of a letup, and Andre Iguodala’s hamstring injury and Andrew Bogut’s reduced playing time are reasons for concern.
lead_paragraph: Golden State’s schedule does not have much of a letup, and Andre Iguodala’s hamstring injury and Andrew Bogut’s reduced playing time are reasons for concern.

headline.main: N.B.A. Game of the Week: Defense Becomes Issue as Warriors Try to Keep Pace
headline.print_headline: Game of the Week: Defense Becomes Issue as Warriors Try to Keep Pace
